Sherif Arafa (amụrụ na Disemba 25, 1960) bụ onye nduzi Egypt, odee na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Cinema na 1982.
Sharif Arafa sonyere n'ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọọrụ ihe nkiri Egypt, dị ka Birds of Darkness , Mafia, Halim na Welad El Am
O mepụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn dị ka Tamer we shawkeya na "Lahazat Harega" "Oge ndị dị oke egwu".
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na onye edemede "Wahid Hamed"
Ọ natara ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'oge ọrụ ya dịka:
Ma nna ya, Saad Arafa, na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere, Amr Arafa, bụ ndị nduzi.
